full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,JO BO SH'AKYA MU NI DANG LHA MO RNAMS KYI SGO NAS RIMS NAD DRAG PO'I ME DPUNG GZHIL ZHING 'CHI MED DPAL STER BDUD RTZI'I CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @024A *, ,(ZHES JO BO SH'AKYA MU NI DANG LHA MO RNAMS KYI SGO NAS RIMS NAD DRAG PO'I ME DPUNG GZHIL ZHING 'CHI MED DPAL STER BDUD RTZI CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, NAD RIMS GDON GYIS NYEN ZHIN RIM GRO RGYAS PA MA LCOGS PA DBUL 'PHONGS MI RNAMS LA RANG GI 'BYOR TSAD DANG BSTUN CHOG PA DANG, 'BYOR BA YOD NA'ANG 'BREL BA'I DUS SU 'PHRAL DU PHAN 'DOD KYI RAB DKAR BSAM PAS KUN NAS BSLANGS TE, SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I TSUL DU RI KHROD PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS, RGYAL BA YAB SRAS DANG RJE T'A RA NA THA SOGS DAM PA DU MA'I GSUNG RGYUN LAS BYUNG BA LTAR PHYOGS GCIG TU BSGRIGS TE, SPRE'U ZHES PA ME LUG LO'I MCHU ZLA'I MAR NGO'I TSES BCU LA SGRUB GNAS KHYAD PAR CAN 'GA' TSAL RDO RJE BRAG RDZONGS AE WAm GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,LONG YOD CING @024B 'BYOR BA CHE BA RNAMS KYIS 'DI RNAMS KYI 'GROS DANG MTHUN PA'I RIM GRO RGYAS PA RNAMS DANG RANG RANG GI GZHUNG BZHIN DU 'BAD PAR RIGS YI GE PA NI BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG GIS BGYIS PA 'DI KYANG 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,RJE BTZUN SGROL MA RIMS NAD SEL MA DANG, ,LO MA GYON MA SANGS RGYAS SPYAN MA DANG, ,SNA TSOGS YUM DANG GDUGS DKAR DMAG ZOR MA, ,KHYED RNAMS BDAG CAG BSRUNG SKYOB MDZAD DU GSOL,, ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
